function rrp_select_row( i_rrp_id   in  lm_route_influence_rule_groups.id%type
                       , o_rt_rrp   out lm_route_influence_rule_groups%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.rrp_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_rrp ( i_rrp_id   in  lm_route_influence_rule_groups.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_route_influence_rule_groups rrp
            where rrp.id = i_rrp_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_rrp( i_rrp_id => i_rrp_id );
         fetch c_rrp into o_rt_rrp;
         l_found := c_rrp%found;
         close c_rrp;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_rrp%isopen
         then
            close c_rrp;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end rrp_select_row;

   l_found                boolean      := false;

   is
           select *
             from lm_route_influence_rule_groups rrp
            where rrp.id = i_rrp_id 
         for update;

   fetch c_rrp into o_rt_rrp;
   l_found := c_rrp%found;

function rrp_select_row_upd_uk1( i_rrp_name   in  lm_route_influence_rule_groups.name%type
                               , o_rt_rrp  out lm_route_influence_rule_groups%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.rrp_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := rrp_select_row_uk1( i_rrp_name   =>  i_rrp_name
                                   , o_rt_rrp => o_rt_rrp );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := rrp_select_row_upd( i_rrp_id => o_rt_rrp.id
                                      , o_rt_rrp => o_rt_rrp );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end rrp_select_row_upd_uk1;

procedure rrp_lock_row( i_rrp_id   in  lm_route_influence_rule_groups.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.rrp_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_rrp ( i_rrp_id   in  lm_route_influence_rule_groups.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_route_influence_rule_groups rrp
              where rrp.id = i_rrp_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_rrp_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                rrp_lock_row_nowait( i_rrp_id => i_rrp_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_rrp( i_rrp_id => i_rrp_id );
                  close c_rrp;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_rrp%isopen
         then
            close c_rrp;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end rrp_lock_row;

procedure rrp_lock_row_nowait( i_rrp_id   in  lm_route_influence_rule_groups.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.rrp_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_rrp ( i_rrp_id   in  lm_route_influence_rule_groups.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_route_influence_rule_groups rrp
               where rrp.id = i_rrp_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_rrp_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_rrp( i_rrp_id => i_rrp_id );

            close c_rrp;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_rrp%isopen
        then
           close c_rrp;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_rrp_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end rrp_lock_row_nowait;

procedure rrp_insert_row ( io_rt_rrp  in out lm_route_influence_rule_groups%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.rrp_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_route_influence_rule_groups( id
                                , name
                                , description )
              values ( io_rt_rrp.id
                     , io_rt_rrp.name
                     , io_rt_rrp.description )
           returning id
                   , name
                   , description
                into io_rt_rrp.id
                   , io_rt_rrp.name
                   , io_rt_rrp.description;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_rrp.id||'"'
                                                             ||', NAME = "'||io_rt_rrp.name||'"'
                                                             ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_rrp.description||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end rrp_insert_row;

function rrp_perform_update( i_rrp_id   in     lm_route_influence_rule_groups.id%type
                           , io_rt_rrp  in out lm_route_influence_rule_groups%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.rrp_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_route_influence_rule_groups
            set id = io_rt_rrp.id
              , name = io_rt_rrp.name
              , description = io_rt_rrp.description
          where id = i_rrp_id
      returning id
              , name
              , description
           into io_rt_rrp.id
              , io_rt_rrp.name
              , io_rt_rrp.description;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_rrp.id||'"'
                                                             ||', NAME = "'||io_rt_rrp.name||'"'
                                                             ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_rrp.description||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end rrp_perform_update;

function rrp_perform_delete( i_rrp_id   in  lm_route_influence_rule_groups.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.rrp_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_route_influence_rule_groups
          where id = i_rrp_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_rrp_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end rrp_perform_delete;

function rrp_update_row( i_rrp_id   in     lm_route_influence_rule_groups.id%type
                       , io_rt_rrp  in out lm_route_influence_rule_groups%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.rrp_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         rrp_lock_row( i_rrp_id   =>  i_rrp_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            rrp_perform_update( i_rrp_id   =>  i_rrp_id
                              , io_rt_rrp  => io_rt_rrp );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_rrp.id||'"'
                                                          ||', NAME = "'||io_rt_rrp.name||'"'
                                                          ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_rrp.description||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end rrp_update_row;

function rrp_delete_row( i_rrp_id   in  lm_route_influence_rule_groups.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.rrp_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         rrp_lock_row( i_rrp_id   =>  i_rrp_id );

         
         l_deleted := rrp_perform_delete( i_rrp_id   =>  i_rrp_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_rrp_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end rrp_delete_row;
